ch.nolix.system.neuronalNet

Class NeuronalNet<IO>

  • java.lang.Object
    • ch.nolix.system.neuronoid.Neuronoid<NeuronalNet<IO>,java.lang.Iterable<IO>,java.lang.Iterable<IO>>
      • ch.nolix.system.neuronalNet.NeuronalNet<IO>
  • Type Parameters:
    IO - The type of the input and output of the neurons of a neuronal net.
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    IFluentObject<NeuronalNet<IO>>

    public final class NeuronalNet<IO>
extends Neuronoid<NeuronalNet<IO>,java.lang.Iterable<IO>,java.lang.Iterable<IO>>
    A neuronal net is a neuron that contains neurons that are connected to a network.
    Author:
    Silvan Wyss
